meanings.definition: A person or thing that processes something.
meanings.sent1: The processors at the factory work hard to package the products.
meanings.sent2: The food processors in the kitchen help chop vegetables quickly.
meanings.sent3: The processors in the office took a break and went for a walk.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a set of processors, analyzing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The processors in the brain help us make sense of the world around us.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that processes data.
meanings.sent1: The computer processors are essential for running programs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The payment processors securely handle online transactions.
meanings.sent3: The processors in the server had a little party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The information flowed through the processors like a river of data.
meanings.sent5: The powerful processors in the new smartphone make it lightning fast.
